text: This name uses Spanish naming customs: the first or paternal surname is Mora and the second or maternal family name is Mendivil. Benjamin Mora Mendivil (born 25 June 1979) is a Mexican football manager. He is now the Head Coach of Team Johor Darul Ta'zim in Malaysia Super League. ==References== Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Mexico City Category:Mexican football managers Category:Mexican expatriates in Malaysia Category:Liga MX managers
title: Benjamin Mora
